responses: Hello! How can I assist you with the application process today?
Hi there! How can I help you?

examples: Where can I create an account?
I want to sign up for the website
How to register for the application?
Tell me the steps for registration
responses: To register, Click 'Register' button below login page on the website. Fill in your personal details, set a password, and submit the form. You’ll receive a confirmation email shortly.
To log in, click on the 'User Login' button on the homepage, enter your registered email and password, and click 'Submit'. If you forgot your password, use the 'Forgot Password' option.

examples: How do I access my dashboard?
How to open my user dashboard?
responses: You can access your dashboard after logging in. Once logged in, there will be current openings displayed with the application form. Click and fill the details to apply them.

examples: How do I fill the application form?
I want to apply for the vacancy
Tell me about the application form
responses: To fill the application form, log in to your dashboard and click on 'Application Form'. Complete all required fields, upload the necessary documents, and review before submitting.

examples: How will I know if my application was successful?
What happens after I submit my application?
Will I get a confirmation after submitting?
responses: After successfully submitting your application, you will see a confirmation message on the website. Additionally, you will receive an acknowledgment email with your application details.

examples: What does the acknowledgment template look like?
Will I get a receipt for my application?
Tell me about the acknowledgment email
responses: The acknowledgment template includes your application ID, submission date, and other key details. You can download it from your dashboard or check your email for the acknowledgment receipt.

examples: Can I see my previous applications?
How to check my old applications?
Tell me about my application records
responses: You can view your application history in the 'Application History' section of your dashboard. It contains all your past submissions with their statuses.

examples: How can I reset my password?
What to do if I forget my login details?
responses: Click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page, enter your registered email address, and follow the instructions sent to your email to reset your password.

examples: I want to make changes to my form
How do I update my details?
Can I update my application after submission?
responses: You can edit your application before the submission deadline. Go to your dashboard, open the application form, make the necessary changes, and save them.

examples: How do I upload my documents?
Where can I attach my certificates?
I want to upload my educational documents
responses: You can upload your documents in the 'Document Upload' section of the application form. Ensure the files are in the required format and size.

examples: How do I track my application?
Where can I check the status of my application?
How do I know if my application is being processed?
responses: To track your application, log in to your dashboard and click on 'Application Status'. You will see the current stage of your application.

examples: I want to log out of my account
responses: To log out, click on your profile icon in the top-right corner and select 'Logout'.

examples: I am facing an error on the site
Something is wrong with my dashboard
responses: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try refreshing the page or clearing your browser cache. If the issue persists, contact support at support@rac.gov.in.
You're welcome! Feel free to reach out if you need further assistance. Goodbye!
if you have submitted the application, you will get updates of the application status via mail from RAC.

examples: there are verification errors in my application
input fields don't match with documents
X mark seen / visible in input during verification
responses: if you are experiencing 'X' mark in the application during verification, its either due to the mismatch of data in the document to the input or the quality of the document is blurred.
to contact rac, you can click on contact here in the login page to post your queries, or you can reach out t support@rac.gov.in.
